attributes.action: Publish detail of all companies paid for any part of track and trace
attributes.additional_details: Public money has been spent on an unprecedented scale and the public has the right to know who the beneficiaries of this spending were, and what they were supposed to achieve with that spending.
attributes.background: Publish the full details of all financial contracts awarded in connection with the so called "Track and trace" system. That is the names of the companies and the names of the directors of those companies.

rejection.details:
You already have the right to see recorded information by public authorities through a Freedom of Information (FOI) request. This includes details of contracts from government departments.

For more information, visit the gov.uk website: https://www.gov.uk/make-a-freedom-of-information-request
